title: JSU Bakhmut Directio Rusian of the Army Shelled Bogdanivka, Time Yar, Kisschivka, Dilivka of Donetsk Region, - General Staff ...
content: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Chasiv Yar, Klischiyivka, Dyliyivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
